questions.question: Does FME support writing both ObjectID and GlobalID based Relationships?
options: No. ObjectID and GlobalID based relationships are only supported for ArcSDE Geodatabase. While File Geodatabase currently only supports writing ObjectID-based relationships.

questions.question: Can FME be used to create Relationship Classes?
options: No, FME cannot create a Relationship Class, it needs to use a File Geodatabase or an XML workspace document as a template(with the Relationship class defined).
